mapper.select: select label_id from doc_file_label where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from doc_label where del_flag != 1
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%','${name}','%')
mapper.insert: insert into doc_label (id, name, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,
name,
create_date,
create_by,
update_date,
update_by,

mapper.update:
update doc_label
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update doc_label set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
